titleStmt.title: The second report of Doctor Iohn Faustus. Containing his appearances, and the deedes of Wagner. / VVritten by an English gentleman student in VVittenberg an Vniuersity of Germany in Saxony. Published for the delight of all those which desire nouelties by a frend of the same gentleman
titleStmt.author: English gentleman student.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Abell Ieffes for Cuthbert Burby, and are to be sold at the middle shop at Saint Mildreds Church by the stockes,

notesStmt.note: Inspired by the German "Ander theil" but essentially an independent text. Cf. STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
